'''Status:'''

'''Accepted''' = accepted and being acted upon and a notification to the nearest team has been sent and waiting for response.

'''Confirmed''' = Accepted and nearest team had responded to the notification and Appointment scheduled and added to the agenda.

'''In progress''' = Accepted, Confirmed and team is fixing the issue Right Now.

'''Done''' = Accepted, Confirmed and the Team have already Finished fixing the issue.
